copy: At Relay, I am responsible for developing, managing and looking after the entire technical stack. From making decisions about what technology to use, what desing pattern to follow, to making it happen.

I was involved in multiple projects at Paymark, One of them being Online Eftpos, which allows a user to pay by just using their mobile number. Other project was to move our entire platform to Containers
At Raremile I worked for numerous number of client from overseas, building web and enterprise applications to meet their demands

This was my first job, initially I was trained for 3 months on Core Java and I aced my training with 93% and was the top scorer for the company. In my 2 years span I worked for various clients ranging from healthcare domain to networking domain
